prompt.content: Using LATTICE SEMICONDUCTOR (ticker: LSCC) FY 2024 10-K and FRED annual nominal GDP data (current US$) calcualte year over year % change in gross profit generated from customers in China from FY 2023 to FY 2024 assuming FY2023 Revenue from China is as reported in the most recent 10-K filing, year over year % change of revenue in China from FY2023 to FY2024 is equal to annual nominal % growth rate of GDP of China in 2024, gross margins of renenue in China is equal to consolidated gross margin in both periods. Provide answer in % rounded to 2 decimals.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"FY2023 revenue from customers in China = $239,192 thousand","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2023 Consolidated Revenue = $737,154"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Consolidated Revenue = $509,401"},{"criteria":"FY2023 Consolidated gross profit = $514,670","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Consolidated gross profit = $340,400","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2023 Gross margin = 69.8%"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Gross margin = 66.8%"},{"criteria":"GDP2024 (China) = $18,743,803,170,827.2","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"GDP2023 (China) = $18,270,356,654,533.2"},{"criteria":"China nominal GDP growth 2024 = 0.0259133702 (2.59133702%)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Projected China Revenue FY2024 = $245,390,270.85","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Gross profit FY2023 (China) = $166,956,016.00","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Gross profit FY2024 (China) = $163,920,700.93"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Year‑over‑year % change in China gross profit = -1.82%"}]
